reasoning: Chronic substance use disorder reported as prevalence. Global Burden of Disease 2005 systematic review found cocaine dependence prevalence equal to or less than 1% point prevalence across 5 countries with data (8% of world population aged 15-64). Estimated point prevalence ~0.75% globally based on available evidence.
source: Gable RS et al. (2005). Global Burden of Disease systematic review on cocaine use and dependence
